ModMetaData.name: Expanded Progression
ModMetaData.author: CosmicDan
ModMetaData.description:
A "bridge" or "companion" mod for the 'Expanded Progression' modpack experience. Adds various little tid-bits that aren't covered by pre-existing mods along with patches to other mods.
Must be loaded at the absolute end of your mod list!
Make sure your mod order looks like this (if any are missing or incompatible, a cryptic error will appear): - Core - Black Fuel - Powerless! - Expanded Progression (this mod)
